tooltips.accessRights: Information that indicates whether the data product is open data, has access restrictions or is not public.
tooltips.accessService: A data service gives access to the distribution of the data product.
tooltips.accessURL: The URL that gives access to a distribution of the data product. The resource at the access URL may contain information about how to get the Dataset. The URL provided must contain the information on the used protocol, i.e. https:// or http://
tooltips.accrualPeriodicity: Frequency at which the data product is updated.
tooltips.adms:status: Status of the data product: Is it work in progress, finished etc.
tooltips.applicableLegislation: This property refers to the legal basis of the data product.
tooltips.archivalValue: Does the data product have ongoing usefulness or significance, based on the administrative, legal, fiscal, evidential, or historical information they contain, which justifies their continued preservation.
tooltips.bv:archivalValue: Does the data product have ongoing usefulness or significance, based on the administrative, legal, fiscal, evidential, or historical information they contain, which justifies their continued preservation.
tooltips.bv:classification: What is the data products' information security classification?
tooltips.bv:externalCatalogs: Shall the data product be published on other plattforms such as i14y and or opendata.swiss?
tooltips.bv:geoIdentifier: What is the corresponding geoidentifier according to Geoinformationsverordnung, Appendix 1.
tooltips.bv:itSystem: What IT system is your data product used in? Please provide an URL.
tooltips.bv:personalData: Does your data product contain personal data?
tooltips.bv:retentionPeriod: How long does your data product need to be retained?
tooltips.bv:typeOfData: What type best describes your data product?
tooltips.classification: What is the data products' information security classification?
tooltips.comment: Is the other relevant information to this data product?
tooltips.conformsTo: Does your data product conform to specific standards and/or specifications?
tooltips.contactPoint: Who should be contacted if the data user has questions or comments concerning the data products content. Please refer to an organizations contact information.
tooltips.dcat:accessService: A data service gives access to the distribution of the data product.
tooltips.dcat:accessURL: The URL that gives access to a distribution of the data product. The resource at the access URL may contain information about how to get the Dataset. The URL provided must contain the information on the used protocol, i.e. https:// or http://
tooltips.dcat:contactPoint: Who should be contacted if the data user has questions or comments concerning the data products content. Please refer to an organizations contact information
tooltips.dcat:distribution: An instance of the data product that can be viewed or consumed. For example a table containing the identic information can be provided as an excel-, csv- or json-file. The three files are distributions of the same data product.
tooltips.dcat:downloadURL: Where can your data product be accessed?
tooltips.dcat:inSeries: Is your data product part of a dataset series? Which one?
tooltips.dcat:keyword: What keywords are helpful to find your dataproduct? It is easier to find your data product if you provide several keywords that are shared with your collegues data products. If you have a proposition of a keyword that should be added to the list, please contact kompetenzzentrumdigitaletransformation@blw.admin.ch
tooltips.dcat:landingPage: Where can a data user find additional context to your data product or the responsible organization?
tooltips.dcat:theme: Theme used to classify the catalogue's data products.
tooltips.dcat:version: What version is this? Please use semantic versioning in the form of X.Y.Z where increases of X indicate major changes, Y minor changes and Z simple corrections such as typos.
tooltips.dcatap:applicableLegislation: This property refers to the legal basis of the data product
tooltips.dcatap:availability: Is the availability of your data product temporary, stable, experimental?
tooltips.dct:accessRights: Information that indicates whether the data product is open data, has access restrictions or is not public.
tooltips.dct:accrualPeriodicity: Frequency at which the data product is updated.
tooltips.dct:conformsTo: Does your data product conform to specific standards and/or specifications?
tooltips.dct:description: Please provide a description so that the data user understand what the data product contains, who is a potential user, and what the data product is used for.
tooltips.dct:format: What file format does this distribution have.
tooltips.dct:issued: When was the data product originally issued?
tooltips.dct:license: Under what license can the data product be used?
tooltips.dct:modified: When was the data product originally issued?
tooltips.dct:publisher: Who is the data products publisher organization?
tooltips.dct:spatial: What geographic region is covered by the data product?
tooltips.dct:temporal: What time period is covered in your data product
tooltips.dct:title: Title of your data product

auth.title: GitHub Authentication
auth.description: Authenticate with GitHub to create or edit datasets.

instructions.title: Instructions:
instructions.step1: Go to GitHub Settings > Developer settings > Personal access tokens
instructions.step2: Create a new token with 'repo' permissions
instructions.step3: Enter your username and token below

validation.tokenMinLength: Token must be at least 10 characters long

errors.invalidToken: Invalid token. Please check your Personal Access Token.
errors.tokenExpired: Token has expired. Please create a new token.
errors.noWritePermission: Token does not have write permission to the repository.
errors.networkError: Network error. Please try again later.

help.title: Need Help?
help.description: Contact the competence center for digital transformation if you need assistance creating a Personal Access Token.

form.comingSoon: The form is currently being implemented...

validation.email: Please enter a valid email address
validation.fillRequired: Please fill out all required fields marked with an asterisk (*)

confirmation.unsavedChanges: You have unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to leave? All changes will be lost.

help.multilingualRequired: At least German and French are required

help.externalCatalogs: Select external catalogs where this dataset should be published
help.relationships: Enter dataset IDs separated by commas for related datasets

form.keywordArray: Press Enter or use comma to add keywords

submit.title: Submit Dataset
submit.authInfo: Authentication is optional - GitHub will ask for credentials
submit.githubDescription: Opens GitHub with pre-filled content for review and commit
submit.copyDescription: Copies JSON to clipboard for manual pasting
submit.downloadDescription: Downloads JSON file for local storage

help.title: How does it work?
help.github: Click 'Create in GitHub' to open GitHub with pre-filled content
help.review: Review changes in GitHub's diff view
help.commit: Create the commit directly in GitHub or create a pull request

not-found.message: The page you are looking for does not exist.
not-found.title: Page not found

ui.noResultsFound: No results found. Try more general filters or search.
